keyIssues.title: Key Issues
keyIssues.description: The most pressing educational challenges we're addressing

paperLeak.title: Stop Paper Leak and Ensure Timely Exam Results
paperLeak.shortDescription: Demand for transparent and secure examination processes
paperLeak.fullDescription: The increasing incidents of paper leaks and delayed results are severely impacting students' academic progress and career opportunities. We are advocating for stricter protocols and accountability.

studentUnion.title: Restoration of Student Union Elections
studentUnion.shortDescription: Advocating for democratic representation in educational institutions
studentUnion.fullDescription: Student unions provide essential democratic representation on campus. We're fighting to restore and strengthen these vital platforms for student voices across Maharashtra institutions.

mentalHealth.title: Academic Pressure and Mental Health
mentalHealth.shortDescription: 63.5% of students report stress due to academic pressure
mentalHealth.fullDescription: The intense academic environment in India, driven by competitive exams, leads to anxiety and depression among students.

financial.title: Financial Barriers
financial.shortDescription: Only 4% of higher education students benefit from education loans
financial.fullDescription: Rising tuition costs and limited financial aid force many students to abandon higher education.

infrastructure.title: Inadequate Educational Infrastructure
infrastructure.fullDescription: Overcrowded classrooms and poor infrastructure hinder effective learning and contribute to high dropout rates.

examStress.title: Exam-related Issues
examStress.shortDescription: 52% of students experience extreme stress during exams
examStress.fullDescription: The competitive exam culture in India causes significant stress, compounded by rote learning and other systemic issues.

college.title: College-related Issues
college.shortDescription: 74% of first-year students feel overwhelmed by academic workload
college.fullDescription: College students face academic pressure, financial stress, and challenges in social and cultural adjustment.

library.title: Library Issues
library.shortDescription: Many libraries face infrastructure and funding challenges
library.fullDescription: Limited access to up-to-date resources and poor infrastructure in libraries hinder students' ability to study effectively.

university.title: University-related Issues
university.shortDescription: Administrative inefficiencies are common complaints among students
university.fullDescription: Bureaucratic hurdles, inadequate support systems, and poor infrastructure in universities create significant challenges.
